column17:
Product Description

"The Body Care Rice Bran Scrub contains organic stones and Vitamin B containing in rice bran and oryza extract which softens and smoothens skin by massaging the invigorating exfoliator to remove dead skin cells and help boost your body's circulation. The natural fragrance from rice brings the aroma benefits of relaxation and leaves you to feel like walking through a field of aromatic rice during the harvesting season. Key Ingredients: Rice Powder Rice Bran Almond Oil Olive Oil"
